SISTEM INFORMASI TUTUPAN DAN IZIN DI IND: INDONESIA LAND COVER AND LICENSE INFORMATION SYSTEM
Menyajikan data, informasi, dan analisis: Presenting data, information and analyses of land cover and licenses in Indonesia.
Seluk-beluk Sistem Informasi Tutupan dan: Intricacies of the Land Cover and License Information System.
Analisis hal-hal spesifik perihal tutupa: Analyses of matters specific to land cover and licenses.
Memuat peta & data tutupan lahan dan izi: Contains land cover and license maps and data.
Peta & data tutupan lahan atau izin yang: Access land cover or license maps and data.
Deforestasi di konsesi kebun kayu Mayawa: Deforestation in the PT Mayawana Persada timber plantation concession, West Kalimantan, killed any hope of there being no deforestation in Indonesia in 2023.
Berapa luas deforestasi di Indonesia?: What was the extent of deforestation in Indonesia?
Berapa luas di kawasan hutan dan APL: How much occurred in forest estate and APL other land use areas?
Adakah di kawasan konservasi?: Did any occur in conservation areas?
Konsesi dan perusahaan apa saja?: Which concessions and companies were involved?
Data dalam Simontini bersifat terbuka da: Data in Simontini is open and accessible to the public under a Creative Commons CC-CY-SA license, subject to compliance with applicable usage rules. When citing data from Simontini, please use the following format.
Deforestasi Indonesia pada 2024 terident: Indonesian deforestation in 2024 was identified to be 261.575 ha; an increase of 4,191 ha on the previous year, which was recorded at 257.384 ha.
Diperlukan terobosan hukum untuk melindu: It is time for President Prabowo Subianto to issue a presidential regulation that provides legal protection for all remaining natural forest in Indonesia.
Tahun lalu Auriga merilis data deforesta: Auriga released deforestation data for 2023 in March last year. Commencing this year, it will release annual deforestation data each January.
